page.title: 10STOTTESDON EVENTS DIARY
page.content: Weekly - Darts & Dominoes league Monthly - W.I. & W.I. committee Quarterly or more - Parish Council, Social Activities Committee, Parochial Church Council, School Governors, Parent-Teacher Club. Annually -{W.I.}Whist drive, Produce show, Handicraft show,Summer outing, Xmas dinner, Fund raising event. { Church}Coffee evening, Summer fete, Harvest supper & sale, Remembrance service, Xmas fair, Carol service, Midnight service Xmas Eve. {School}Fund raising event, Summer educational outing, Sports day, Prize giving, Harvest festival, Xmas party, Nativity play. {Social Activities Committee} Pantomime trip, Senior Citizens' Xmas dinner, Family coach outing. Burwarton Show, & events in Chorley are widely supported, also, Y.F.C.
